title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 16 August 2012 - XWiki
content:

10:31 <coud> has joined #xwiki  
10:43 <coud> Hi, I want to create xwiki class with list of linked pages/documents of the same type. In UI, there should be list of already selected documents and button opening dialog for additional page selection. In http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/DataModel there is "Document List" datatype but I cannot find it in my Xwiki Enterprise 4.2m1 installation.  
10:44 <vmassol> coud: this type is new in XE 4.2M3  
10:44 <vmassol> (and hi :))  
10:44 <vmassol> fixing the doc  
10:45 <coud> vmassol great, thanks! :)
